item.description:
ome dance to this irresistible band:

SOUL CITY - BENEFIT for THE FISHING ACADEMY @ the BRIGHTON ELKS LODGE

Tickets tiered at $100 Contributor or $50 Supporter.

"Help us make a positive impact on today's youth!"
Date:Friday, April 26, 2013
Place: Brighton Elks Lodge 2199
326 Washington Street, Brighton, MA 02135
Time: 5:00PM Cocktail Reception
Food, Music, Raffles, Live and Silent Auctions!

tix to McCartney, Jason Aldean, New Kids, Red Sox and more!

ou are Cordially Invited!
This year's event will feature a cocktail reception, full bar, live music from Soul City Band, awards, sponsor recognition, live and silent auctions. Enjoy a fabulous evening out with some old and new friends while supporting The Fishing Academy Charity. Auction items include luxury products, high-end sports memorabilia, vacation get-away's, fine dining, and much more. All proceeds donated 100% to funding scholarships and programs to support inner-city youth. Tickets tiered at $100 Contributor or $50 Supporter.

Call (617) 782-2614 for information on how you can participate in TFA's 2013 event.

Thank You Again!
item.name: Soul City Band at Brighton Elks Fundraiser
